org.daisy.braille.pef
Class PEFHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      org.daisy.braille.pef.PEFHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class PEFHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler

Provides a handler for reading a PEF-file and sending the contents to an Embosser. Constructor is private on purpose, use a Builder to create a new PEFHandler.

Version:
3 sep 2008
Author:
Joel Hakansson, TPB, Bert Frees
